akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Administrator shall plan, develop, and implement a program, in coordination with other Federal agencies, to detect, track, catalog, and reduce the number of counterfeit electronic parts in the NASA supply chain.
(b) Requirements In carrying out the program, the Administrator shall establish—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Review of procurement and acquisition policy

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Review of procurement and acquisition policy
(d) Report to Congress Within one year after October 11, 2010, the Administrator shall report on the progress of implementing this section to the appropriate committees of Congress.
